title: Reason for increase in consumer spending

content.prompt: Under which of the following conditions would consumer spending most likely increase?

choices.label: Consumers have large unpaid balances on their credit cards.
Consumersâ€™ wealth is increased by changes in the stock market.
The government encourages consumers to increase their savings.
Consumers believe they will not receive pay increases next year.

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Using economic concepts, principles, or models, explain how a specific economic outcome occurs, or what action should be taken in order to achieve a specific economic outcome.
